Veteran Ascalon:
There has been a message from the เมืองหลวง โอเรน that it is about to be reduced by the great army of road scavengers. We need as many volunteers as possible to help protect the เมืองหลวง โอเรน. Go and meet Captain Mouen of the เมืองหลวง โอเรน, and follow his instructions. Always be reminded that the destiny of the whole kingdom lies in this battle!
